page.title: 08HEALTH TREDIS
page.content: SURGERIES WITH PRESCRIPTION FACILITIES ARE AVAILABLE AT ST.GERMANS AND DOWNDERRY. DOCTORS FROM ST.GERMANS VISIT IN THE AREA AND CAN BE CONTACTED IN AN EMERGENCY BY RADIO TELEPHONE. THE NEAREST HOSPITAL AND X-RAY UNIT IS AT PASSMORE EDWARDS HOSPITAL LISKEARD. HOME VISITS ARE MADE BY DISTRICT NURSES AND HEALTH VISITORS. ALSO PRIVATE HOME TREATMENTS BY CHIROPODIST AND PHYSIOTHERAPIST ARE OBTAINABLE. MEALS ON WHEELS CAN BE PROVIDED FROM ST.GERMANS OR DOWNDERRY SCHOOLS. ST.WINNOLLS,FORMERLY A FARMHOUSE, IS NOW A SMALL RESIDENTIAL HOME, CARING FOR A CAPACITY OF ELEVEN PEOPLE. THERE IS NOW MORE ACCOMMODATION FOR OLD PEOPLE AS A HOTEL IN DOWNDERRY HAS THIS YEAR REOPENED AS A FEE-PAYING NURSING HOME,FROM 120 POUNDS PER PATIENT PER WEEK.
